item.title: Welcome To My Blog!
item.description: Who Am I? My name is Liam, and I’m a Data scientist. I currently work in financial research, and have a keen interest in R, open source data and football (AFL). What Will I Post About? I don’t know, mainly footy related, a bit of government and council data. Whatever takes my interest, I guess.
